item.title: Git and GitHUB
item.description: Learning Git and GitHub: A Roadmap Introduction Hello everyone! Today, I want to share my journey and the valuable lessons I learned while diving into the world of Git and GitHub. As a developer, I quickly realized that mastering these tools is essential in the technical environment, given the vast number of users on platforms like GitHub and GitLab. I’ll recount my initial mistakes and provide you with a roadmap to learn Git and GitHub effectively.
